entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries later this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
